C

checkForGameEnd() - Method in class controller.PongGameController
The checkForGameEnd method detects whether a player won
If a player has won, the displayResults method is subsequently called
checkForScore() - Method in class controller.PongGameController
The checkForScore method checks if a player has scored
If a player has scored, then they are awarded 1 point
The ball is then reset and begins moving again
collectCredentials() - Method in class controller.LoginController
The collectCredentials method collects the user-entered username and password and calls the validateCredentials method
collectNewCredentials() - Method in class controller.RegisterController
The collectNewCredentials method collects the user-entered username and password and calls the validUsername method
If the new credentials are valid, then AnchorPane visibility is altered so as to take the user to the preGameView screen, otherwise an error message is displayed
controller - package controller
 
createAccount - Variable in class controller.StartScreenController
 
createAcctBtn - Variable in class controller.AppController
 
createAcctBtn - Variable in class controller.RegisterController
 
createAcctBtnHandler() - Method in class controller.StartScreenController
The createAcctBtnHandler method opens createAcctView once the create account button is clicked
createAcctMenuBtn - Variable in class controller.AppController
 
createAcctPane - Variable in class controller.AppController
 
createAcctValidationMsg - Variable in class controller.AppController
 
createAcctView - Variable in class controller.AppController
 
createAcctView - Variable in class controller.PreGameController
 
createAcctView - Variable in class controller.StartScreenController
 
credentialsExistInDb(String, String) - Method in class controller.LoginController
The credentialsExistInDb method returns true if the user-entered credentials match a database item, false otherwise
